title: NCLT directs RattanIndia Finance to appoint Bipin Kabra as its CFO - Moneycontrol
content: NCLT directs RattanIndia Finance to appoint Bipin Kabra as its CFO  Moneycontrol
description: LSF 10 Rose Investments, is a subsidiary of US-based private equity firm Lone Star Funds (LSF), and holds 50 per cent shareholding in RattanIndia Finance (RF), a non-banking finance company.
